1.brief: properly, to eye or (generally) to heed, i.e. pay attention; by implication, to respond; by extension to begin to speak; specifically to sing, shout, testify, announce
a Shuchite or descendant of Shuach

2.brief: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
where?; hence, whither?, when?; also hither and thither

wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
vast, whether in extent (figuratively, of power, mighty; of time, aged), or in number, many
the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to

3.brief: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)

properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style
used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity

4.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
a son (as a builder of the family name), in the widest sense (of literal and figurative relationship, including grandson, subject, nation, quality or condition, etc., (like father or brother), etc.)
properly, to miss; hence (figuratively and generally) to sin; by inference, to forfeit, lack, expiate, repent, (causatively) lead astray, condemn
to send away, for, or out (in a great variety of applications)
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),

5.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
properly, to dawn, i.e. (figuratively) be (up) early at any task (with the implication of earnestness); by extension, to search for (with painstaking)
near, with or among; often in general, to
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
near, with or among; often in general, to
properly, to bend or stoop in kindness to an inferior; to favor, bestow; causatively to implore (i.e. move to favor by petition)

6.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
thou and thee, or (plural) ye and you
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
at this time, whether adverb, conjunction or expletive
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
to be safe (in mind, body or estate); figuratively, to be (causatively, make) completed; by implication, to be friendly; by extension, to reciprocate (in various applications)
(adjectively) at home; hence (by implication of satisfaction) lovely; also (noun) a home, of God (temple), men (residence), flocks (pasture), or wild animals (den)
the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity

7.brief: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
the first, in place, time, order or rank (specifically, a firstfruit)
petty (in size or number); adverbially, a short (time)
the last or end, hence, the future; also posterity
properly, vehemence, i.e. (with or without preposition) vehemently; by implication, wholly, speedily, etc. (often with other words as an intensive or superlative; especially when repeated)

8.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
to inquire; by implication, to request; by extension, to demand
'I pray', 'now', or 'then'; added mostly to verbs (in the Imperative or Future), or to interjections, occasionally to an adverb or conjunction
properly, a revolution of time, i.e. an age or generation; also a dwelling
first, in place, time or rank (as adjective or noun)

properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)
father, in a literal and immediate, or figurative and remote application

9.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
properly, ago, i.e. a (short or long) time since; especially yesterday, or  day before yesterday
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
(by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)

10.brief: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
properly, to flow as water (i.e. to rain); transitively, to lay or throw (especially an arrow, i.e. to shoot); figuratively, to point out (as if by aiming the finger), to teach
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.
a word; collectively, a discourse; figuratively, a topic

11.brief: to mount up; hence, in general, to rise, (figuratively) be majestic
properly, an absorbent, i.e. the bulrush (from its porosity); specifically the papyrus
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
a bulrush or any marshy grass (particularly that along the Nile)
properly, failure, i.e. nothing or destruction; usually (with preposition) without, not yet, because not, as long as, etc.
water; figuratively, juice; by euphemism, urine, semen

12.brief: properly, iteration or continuance; used only adverbially (with or without preposition), again, repeatedly, still, more
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
to be ashamed, confused or disappointed; also (as failing) to dry up (as water) or wither (as herbage)

13.brief: properly, set upright; hence (figuratively as adjective) just; but usually (as adverb or conjunction) rightly or so (in various applications to manner, time and relation; often with other particles)
a well-trodden road (literally or figuratively); also a caravan
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
to mislay, i.e. to be oblivious of, from want of memory or attention
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
literally a cord (as an attachment); figuratively, expectancy
properly, to wander away, i.e. lose oneself; by implication to perish (causative, destroy)

14.brief: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
properly, fatness, i.e. by implication (literally) the loin (as the seat of the leaf fat) or (generally) the viscera; also (figuratively) silliness or (in a good sense) trust
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
properly, a refuge, i.e. (objective) security, or (subjective) assurance

15.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to stand, in various relations (literal and figurative, intransitive and transitive)
to fasten upon; hence, to seize, be strong (figuratively, courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)

16.brief: he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.

17.brief: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
something rolled, i.e. a heap of stone or dung (plural ruins), by analogy, a spring of water (plural waves)
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)
to gaze at; mentally to perceive, contemplate (with pleasure); specifically, to have avision of

18.brief: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
to make away with (specifically by swallowing); generally, to destroy
properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)
to be untrue, in word (to lie, feign, disown) or deed (to disappoint, fail, cringe)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)

19.brief: he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
delight, concretely (the cause or object) or abstractly (the feeling)
a road (as trodden); figuratively, a course of life or mode of action, often adverb
dust (as powdered or gray); hence, clay, earth, mud
properly, hinder; generally, next, other, etc.
to sprout (transitive or intransitive, literal or figurative)

20.brief: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
complete; usually (morally) pious; specifically, gentle, dear
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to fasten upon; hence, to seize, be strong (figuratively, courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),
properly, to spoil (literally, by breaking to pieces); figuratively, to make (or be) good fornothing, i.e. bad (physically, socially or morally)

21.brief: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
to fill or (intransitively) be full of, in a wide application (literally and figuratively)
the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to
the lip (as a natural boundary); by implication, language; by analogy, a margin (of a vessel, water, cloth, etc.)
clamor, i.e. acclamation of joy or a battle-cry; especially clangorof trumpets, as an alarum

22.brief: properly, wrap around, i.e. (by implication) to put on agarment or clothe (oneself, or another), literally or figuratively
shame (the feeling and the condition, as well as its cause); by implication (specifically) an idol
a tent (as clearly conspicuous from a distance)
morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
